io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay.javafx

Class VisualGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay.Grid<VisualTile>
      • io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay.javafx.VisualGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Tile>

    public class VisualGrid
extends Grid<VisualTile>
    A class to represent a scalable Grid in javafx. Needs a pane to draw the grid to.
